long_description: Used underneath your Kelty Salida 2 tent, this nylon tarp extends the tent's life by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear. Sizing specific to the tent prevents water from pooling between the tent and footprint in rainy weather. Webbing stake-outs at tent corners provide easy attachment.
short_description: Used underneath your Kelty Salida 2 tent, this nylon tarp extends the tent's life by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear.
